Text: The Blancpain GT Series Sprint Cup, formerly the FIA GT Series in 2013 and the Blancpain Sprint Series in 2014 and 2015, is a sports car racing series organized by the Stéphane Ratel Organisation (SRO) with the approval of the Fédération Internationale de l'Automobile (FIA).
Triplets:<Blancpain GT Series
1:
--------------------
<Text: Blancpain GT Series Sprint Cup:  The championship is mostly concentrated in Europe, but will visit other continents including Asia.>
Triplets:<Blancpain GT Series Sprint Cup
2:
--------------------
Text: Blancpain GT Series Sprint Cup:  The series continues the sprint format for GT-cars carried out by the defunct FIA GT1 World Championship.
